co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

Interface GalleryManagerConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GalleryManagerConfigurationDefault

    public interface GalleryManagerConfiguration
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15. Includes a list of values which are required to manage galleries (e.g. pathname to root dir of all galleries. The purpose of having this data in an interface/class is to avoid having to change a lot of code (particularly parameter lists) when a new configuration item is identified.
